title: Seven Forevers
description: Seventeen-year-old Maya Shea had been dreaming of finding her soul mate for as long as she could remember, but she wasn’t expecting the unusual way that he would come into her life, nor could she have imagined the roller coaster ride that would be thrust upon her from the instant their paths crossed.Maya couldn’t have predicted that Kellan, with the unmistakable sparking blue eyes from her dreams, was from a distant planet. Though their love is forbidden by Kellan's world, no obstacle can stop them from being together, not Kellan's family, or the hostile stranger who pursues Maya.Seven Forevers is a fantasy romance novel that will capture the hearts and imaginations of young adult and adult readers alike. It is at its core, a passionate love story about two souls who were meant to be together despite the impossible obstacles they face.
author: Melanie Knight
